message: Repo already includes an argparse PLC CLI (tools/plc_cli/plc_cli.py) and a Streamlit tester (streamlit_plc_tester.py). Root main.py provides basic flags for PLC/logging/doctor. The new interactive CLI should wrap these rather than duplicate logic.

data.recommendation: Use Typer+Questionary wrapper commands that set env keys and call into existing Python entrypoints instead of re-implementing Modbus/manager logic.
